review_data.title: Cozy pub with Saturday night pub quiz
review_data.content: Came here for the twice monthly Saturday night pub quiz. Great fun! Had a good burger and chips. Atmosphere is friendly and they have a range of English beers. The crowd was a mix of expats and locals. Will definitely return.

review_data.title: Burger und Bier
review_data.content: Freundlich sympathischer Ort, mit gutem Bier und anständigem PommesBurger. Schaue gerne wieder mal rein...

review_data.title: Pub across street from St Joseph's Catholic Church
review_data.content: Went to evening Mass at St Joseph's Catholic church and noted Pub close by. There is inside and outside dining. We selected table outside and our waitress Tisch was super and accomodating. We ordered Chicken Schnitzel and Saisonbier. The meal was excellent. This Pub is...More

review_data.title: Good burgers
review_data.content: Decided to stop here on a rainy Saturday. Got a great beef burger and veggie burger. Great service from Linda.

review_data.title: Stumbled upon this pub wandering back to our hotel.........
review_data.content: We were bobbing and weaving our way back to our hotel and stumbled upon this pub. The music was great, sports on TV, lots of beers to choose from - perfect! Upon entering, the smell of home cooking convinced us we wanted more than just...More

review_data.title: Loved this cute place in Zurich!
review_data.content: Great selection of different beers from the UK but also some nice swiss ones. The burger was amazing and the staff were super friendly..all in all a very cute place for a beer and a bite!

review_data.title: Best burger in Zurich!
review_data.content: Super leckerer Burger und sehr gemütliche Atmosphäre! Wirklich zu empfehlen! Bedienung war auch sehr nett :)

review_data.title: Another pub
review_data.content: Nothing very easy to remember, normal pub in the backstreet, a bit off the usual paths. Very friendly staff.

review_data.title: Best Burger in town
review_data.content: It's a lovely & very cozy pub....Unfortunately not in the center of the city. A fantastic choice of beers - such as Bombardier, Old Peculier and Proper Job from the St. Austell Brewery. I would say they have the best burger in town. Nice staff...More

review_data.title: Simple pub, not more not less
review_data.content: A typical simple pub a bit far off where I normally used to go out. Good selection of beers and nice staff.

review_data.title: A nice neighborhood bar
review_data.content: St. Joseph’s Pub is a nice pub located one block from Tram stop Quellenstrasse, tram 4/13/17.. Enter through the barrel façade and enjoy the simple atmosphere. The seating area consists of a bar and tall stools, wooden table and chairs. They offer darts, TV’s (showing...More

review_data.title: Random pub find
review_data.content: Wandering the back streets of Zurich looking for a beer and a bite to eat. Did well... Good beer selection, friendly staff, plus fine food. Tasty schnitzel and xmas ale all made a top evening.Not that expensive either!

review_data.title: Bester Pub Food in Zürich
